channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Amazon Link
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Amazon Link

item.title: CVE-2022-1645|2024-08-03T00:10:03.746Z -- unknown -- amazon%20link
item.description: The Amazon Link WordPress plugin through 3.2.10 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed.
